headline: Equifax Introduces Income Confirm to Strengthen Decisioning Confidence During the Credit Card Origination Process
summary: Equifax速 (NYSE:EFX) today announced the launch of Income Confirm, a new product that delivers verified employment and income data from The Work Number速 alongside an Equifax Consumer Credit Report. This integration provides lenders with a more comprehensive view of applicant risk and financial capacity during credit card origination.
